metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43668 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: Go-Ethereum 1.10.9 nodes crash (denial of service) after receiving a serial of messages and cannot be recovered. They will crash with "runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" and arise a SEGV signal.

notes.Note: sbeattie> go-ethereum project claims this issue is in the syndtr/goleveldb project.

criterions.comment: golang-goleveldb package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
